name: Garestia
description:
Garestia is a Free to Play online multiplayer battle royale game, action battle IO, battle death match Game with Sexual Content and Nudity.
Battle with up to 20 players online fight through unique stages.
Play solo or team and be the last ones standing.
Battle Royale Online or Offline multiplayer with bot enemies.
10+ unique stages.

There are 4 modes to play with friends : IO, Death Match, Team Death Match, Battle Royale.

Get Garestia now and join the fun!
